participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and adventurous, enjoys expressing herself through fashion and hobbies.
participant_1.background: I love to dress up and go to comic cons with my husband. My mother worked for Apple. I am not out to my family and I am worried about their acceptance. I drive a BMW. My favorite outfit is thigh high leather boots and a skirt.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and supportive, has a passion for movies and enjoys connecting with others over shared interests.
participant_2.background: I believe that I have a good relationship with my family. I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies. I have freckles all over my face. During the week, I work as a barista. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just got off work. How about you?
I'm good, just hanging out.
Nice, what do you do for fun?
I like to go to comic cons and dress up with my husband.
That sounds like fun! Do you have any favorite costumes?
My favorite is my thigh high leather boots and skirt.
I bet that looks great! What kind of movies do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of movies, but my favorites are horror and sci-fi.
Oh, I love horror movies too! I have a huge collection of movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
That's awesome! I love collecting stuff like that.
Me too, it's so much fun. Do you work during the week?
Yeah, I'm a barista.
Oh, that sounds like a cool job. I've always wanted to try it.
It's pretty fun, but it can be tiring.
I bet. Do you have any creative hobbies?
I used to draw a lot, but I haven't had much time lately.
Oh, that's too bad. I love to draw too, but I'm not very good at it.
I'm sure you're better than you think.
Thanks, I'm trying to get better.
You should, it's a lot of fun.
I will, thanks for the encouragement.
